message:
Lets say we have SharePoint 2013 site and using windows and forms authentication.
How to make a session timeout after a time (15 minutes) in case of forms authentication only?
I set "timeout" property of the session state in web config file but nothing happen
So any recommendation?

data.message: The session timeout for sharepoint usually handled from power shell using the following command "Set-SPSessionStateService -SessionTimeout 15" where 15 is number of minutes you wish to set the session to
Okay this will handle Windows Authentication not forms authentication.

according to MSDN "https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/1d3t3c61(v=vs.71).aspx"  you can set the timeout through the web.config of the sharepoint site. please check it and tell me if there is any progress
Before applying the above solution you should  Enable-SPSessionStateService  and then modify the session state within Web.config
